analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/13/0xa9707c72cea2d71329b5f0136ea929f1ad41ffe1.sol:
	Contract Bitcoinalphared has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/13/0xa9707c72cea2d71329b5f0136ea929f1ad41ffe1.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/13/0xa9707c72cea2d71329b5f0136ea929f1ad41ffe1.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
